Great albums, but some of the id3 tags are completely FUCKED. Songs under the wrong band name (CoX/Xymox), wrong track numbers, some of them are just missing those things altogether, etc.

You can fix them yourself, but it takes a bit of time and you have to wait until you've finished seeding at least 100%...
